import React from 'react'; //IMPORT MODULES import NavBar from './NavBarWhite'; import Contact from './Contact'; import HeaderProjects from './HeaderProjects'; import Styles from './Styles'; //IMPORT IMAGENES import CatalunyaHeader from '../assets/img/Catalunya/CatalunyaHome.png'; import ProblemCatalunya from '../assets/img/Catalunya/ProblemCatalunya.png'; import CatalunyaWireframe1 from '../assets/img/Catalunya/CatalunyaWireframe1.png'; import CatalunyaWireframe2 from '../assets/img/Catalunya/CatalunyaWireframe2.png'; import CatalunyaWireframe3 from '../assets/img/Catalunya/CatalunyaWireframe3.png'; import CatalunyaWireframe4 from '../assets/img/Catalunya/CatalunyaWireframe4.png'; import StylesImg from '../assets/img/Catalunya/StylesImg.png'; import TypoImg from '../assets/img/Catalunya/TypoImg.png'; import ButtonsImg from '../assets/img/Catalunya/ButtonsImg.png'; class Catalunya extends React.Component{ state = { header: { img: CatalunyaHeader, title: 'CATALUNYA.COM', clase: 'catalunya-header project-header' }, styles: { coloursImg: StylesImg, typoImg: TypoImg, buttonsImg: ButtonsImg } } render(){ return(

OVERVIEW

Catalunya.com is a website created to attract turism to Catalonia. Offering a lot of activities, events and routes adapting this range of options to all type of people. Also wants to help the user offering the oportunity of buy experience at the moment with the platform “Experience Catalunya”.

Role & Duration

UX/UI Designer: Product Thinking, Interaction, Visual design & Prototyping

1 week 2020

Team: Solo

DEFINE THE OBJECTIVE

The objective of this projects was:

  • Design a new information arquitecture proposal.
  • Design a new visual propopsal.
  • Responsive design it for Desktop and Mobile.

FIND THE PROBLEM, EXPLORE SOLUTIONS

I had 4 points to cover:

  • OVERINFORMATION: Seems like they wanted to show a lot of information to the user, but that is overwhelming and unuseful.
  • ORDER: It’s really hard to find what you want.
  • THE SEARCHER: is poorly understood.
  • Information repeated.

ARCHITECTURE

I changed the architecture to order all the information starting with the menu.

I separated the menu by epics:

  • What to see
  • Where to go
  • Activities
  • Organize your trip

WIREFRAMES, FIRST CONTACT

This wireframes helped me to start with the guerrilla testing to validate the functionalities and detect some issues with the interactions.

After these testings I iterated the wireframes and added some colors and text style.

SOLUTION

  • Testing the prototype a lot
  • Adding new functionallities iteratively incremental
  • Showing all the phases of the animal/product until consumtion
  • Creating new interactions to involve the user
  • Adding beneffits and helping the people to change their habits
) } } export default Catalunya
